languages.text: {n}Устройство кажется смутно знакомым. Не ваш ли это {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}, тот, что был отобран мятежниками в день смерти Теодоры? Под вашим взглядом шарики крови начинают суматошно метаться по корпусу устройства, и вдруг замирают. Вокс оживает и с сиплым потрескиванием выпускает череду коротких фраз. Голос, произносящий их, знаком вам так же хорошо, как и устройство — это голос бывшего Мастера шепотов, вашего соперника и пособника Хаоса.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Устройство кажется смутно знакомым. Не ваш ли это вокс, тот, что был отобран мятежниками в день смерти Теодоры? Под вашим взглядом шарики крови начинают суматошно метаться по корпусу устройства, и вдруг замирают. Вокс оживает и с сиплым потрескиванием выпускает череду коротких фраз. Голос, произносящий их, знаком вам так же хорошо, как и устройство — это голос бывшего Мастера шепотов, вашего соперника и пособника Хаоса.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The device seems vaguely familiar. Could this be your {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}, the one the mutineers took from you the day Theodora died? Under your gaze, the balls of blood begin to scurry along the casing frantically, then suddenly go still. The vox springs to life and, through hoarse crackling, lets out a series of short phrases. The voice that speaks them is just as well known to you as the device is — it is the voice of the former Master of Whispers, your rival and a Chaos collaborator.{/n}

Под вашим взглядом шарики крови начинают суматошно метаться по корпусу устройства, и вдруг замирают. Вокс оживает и с сиплым потрескиванием выпускает череду коротких фраз. Under your gaze, the balls of blood begin to scurry along the casing frantically, then suddenly go still. The vox springs to life and, through hoarse crackling, lets out a series of short phrases. The voice that speaks them is just as well known to you as the device is — it is the voice of the former Master of Whispers, your rival and a Chaos collaborator.{/n}

languages.text: {n}どこかで見たことのあるような装置だ。シオドーラが死んだ日に変異体の技術者のひとりが自分から奪った{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}だろうか？しばらく見つめていると、血の玉が外箱を必死に転がり、突然静止した。ヴォクスに命が吹き込まれ、かすれた音で単発的にいくつもの言葉を発した。装置と同じように、聞き覚えのある声が流れてきた…かつてのライバルであり渾沌と共謀していた、元囁きの主の声だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The device seems vaguely familiar. Could this be your {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}, the one the mutineers took from you the day Theodora died? Under your gaze, the balls of blood begin to scurry along the casing frantically, then suddenly go still. The vox springs to life and, through hoarse crackling, lets out a series of short phrases. The voice that speaks them is just as well known to you as the device is — it is the voice of the former Master of Whispers, your rival and a Chaos collaborator.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}どこかで見たことのあるような装置だ。テオドラが死んだ日に変異体の技術者のひとりが自分から奪った{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}だろうか？しばらく見つめていると、血の玉が外箱を必死に転がり、突然静止した。ヴォクスに命が吹き込まれ、かすれた音で単発的にいくつもの言葉を発した。装置と同じように、聞き覚えのある声が流れてきた――かつてのライバルであり渾沌と共謀していた、元囁きの主の声だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}这件装置似乎有些眼熟。莫非这是你的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}装置？就是西奥多拉被害的那天，叛乱分子从你手中夺走的那个装置？在你的注视下，血球沿着外壳疯狂地滚动起来，随后猛然静止。音阵装置突然激活，沙哑的噼啪声中传出了一系列简短的话语。这些话语的声音你很熟悉，就像这台音阵装置一样熟悉。说话的人是前任低语之主，是与混沌勾结的叛徒，也是你的敌人。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The device seems vaguely familiar. Could this be your {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}, the one the mutineers took from you the day Theodora died? Under your gaze, the balls of blood begin to scurry along the casing frantically, then suddenly go still. The vox springs to life and, through hoarse crackling, lets out a series of short phrases. The voice that speaks them is just as well known to you as the device is — it is the voice of the former Master of Whispers, your rival and a Chaos collaborator.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这件装置似乎有些眼熟。莫非这是你的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}装置？就是西奥多拉被害的那天，叛乱分子从你手中夺走的那个装置？在你的注视下，血球沿着外壳疯狂地滚动起来，随后猛然静止。音阵装置突然激活，沙哑的噼啪声中传出了一系列简短的话语。这些话语的声音你很熟悉，就像这台音阵装置一样熟悉。说话的人是前任低语之主，是与混沌勾结的叛徒，也是你的敌人。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El dispositivo te resulta algo familiar. ¿Podría ser tu {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g}, que los amotinados te arrebataron el día de la muerte de Theodora? Bajo tu mirada, las bolas de sangre empiezan a recorrer la carcasa frenéticamente hasta que se inmovilizan. El voco cobra vida y, entre risas roncas, suelta una serie de frases cortas. Conoces tan bien la voz que las pronuncia como el dispositivo. Es la voz del anterior maestro de susurros, tu rival y un colaborador del Caos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The device seems vaguely familiar. Could this be your {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}, the one the mutineers took from you the day Theodora died? Under your gaze, the balls of blood begin to scurry along the casing frantically, then suddenly go still. The vox springs to life and, through hoarse crackling, lets out a series of short phrases. The voice that speaks them is just as well known to you as the device is — it is the voice of the former Master of Whispers, your rival and a Chaos collaborator.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El dispositivo te resulta algo familiar. ¿Podría ser tu {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g}, que los amotinados te arrebataron el día de la muerte de Theodora? Bajo tu mirada, las bolas de sangre empiezan a recorrer la carcasa frenéticamente hasta que se inmovilizan. El voco cobra vida y, entre risas roncas, suelta una serie de frases cortas. Conoces tan bien la voz que las pronuncia como el dispositivo. Es la voz del anterior maestro de susurros, tu rival y un colaborador del Caos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'appareil vous semble vaguement familier. Pourrait-il s'agir de votre {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}, celui que les mutins vous ont pris le jour de la mort de Théodora ? Sous votre regard, les billes de sang se mettent à rouler de plus en plus vite sur le boîtier, avant de s'immobiliser d'un coup. Le vox se met alors en marche et diffuse une série de phrases courtes entrecoupées de grésillements. Vous reconnaissez la voix qui les prononce tout autant que l'appareil : elle appartient à l'ancien maître des murmures, votre rival et un collaborateur du Chaos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The device seems vaguely familiar. Could this be your {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}, the one the mutineers took from you the day Theodora died? Under your gaze, the balls of blood begin to scurry along the casing frantically, then suddenly go still. The vox springs to life and, through hoarse crackling, lets out a series of short phrases. The voice that speaks them is just as well known to you as the device is — it is the voice of the former Master of Whispers, your rival and a Chaos collaborator.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'appareil vous semble vaguement familier. Pourrait-il s'agir de votre {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}, celui que les mutins vous ont pris le jour de la mort de Théodora ? Sous votre regard, les billes de sang se mettent à rouler de plus en plus vite sur le boîtier, avant de s'immobiliser d'un coup. Le vox se met alors en marche et diffuse une série de phrases courtes entrecoupées de grésillements. Vous reconnaissez la voix qui les prononce tout autant que l'appareil : elle appartient à l'ancien maître des murmures, votre rival et un collaborateur du Chaos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Gerät kommt dir vage vertraut vor. Könnte das dein {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} sein, das die Meuterer dir am Tag von Theodoras Tod abgenommen haben? Unter deinem Blick rasen die Blutkugeln hektisch über das Gehäuse und halten plötzlich inne. Das Vox aktiviert sich, und zwischen Knacksen und Knistern hörst du mehrere kurze Sätze. Die Stimme, die sie spricht, ist dir ebenso bekannt wie das Gerät – sie gehört dem früheren Meister des Geflüsters, deinem Rivalen und einem Chaos-Kollaborateur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The device seems vaguely familiar. Could this be your {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}, the one the mutineers took from you the day Theodora died? Under your gaze, the balls of blood begin to scurry along the casing frantically, then suddenly go still. The vox springs to life and, through hoarse crackling, lets out a series of short phrases. The voice that speaks them is just as well known to you as the device is — it is the voice of the former Master of Whispers, your rival and a Chaos collaborator.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Gerät kommt dir vage vertraut vor. Könnte das dein {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} sein, das die Meuterer dir am Tag von Theodoras Tod abgenommen haben? Unter deinem Blick rasen die Blutkugeln hektisch über das Gehäuse und halten plötzlich inne. Das Vox aktiviert sich, und zwischen Knacksen und Knistern hörst du mehrere kurze Sätze. Die Stimme, die sie spricht, ist dir ebenso bekannt wie das Gerät – sie gehört dem früheren Meister des Geflüsters, deinem Rivalen und einem Chaos-Kollaborateur.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aygıt sanki tanıdık geliyor. {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Voksunu{/g}, Theodora'nın öldüğü gün asilerden biri almıştı. O olabilir mi? Sen onları incelerken kan topları kaplama üzerinde çılgınca hareket etmeye başlıyor, ardından aniden duruyorlar. Voks faaliyete geçiyor, boğuk tıkırtıların arasından bir dizi kısa söz seçilebiliyor. Sesin sahibi sana bu aygıt kadar tanıdık: Kaos iş birlikçisi rakibin, eski Fısıltı Üstadı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The device seems vaguely familiar. Could this be your {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}, the one the mutineers took from you the day Theodora died? Under your gaze, the balls of blood begin to scurry along the casing frantically, then suddenly go still. The vox springs to life and, through hoarse crackling, lets out a series of short phrases. The voice that speaks them is just as well known to you as the device is — it is the voice of the former Master of Whispers, your rival and a Chaos collaborator.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aygıt sanki tanıdık geliyor. {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Voks{/g}unu Theodora'nın öldüğü gün asilerden biri almıştı, bu o olabilir mi? Sen onları incelerken kan topları kaplama üzerinde çılgınca hareket etmeye başlıyor ve ardından aniden duruyorlar. Voks faaliyete geçiyor ve boğuk tıkırtıların arasından bir dizi kısa söz seçilebiliyor. Sesin sahibi sana bu aygıt kadar tanıdık: Kaos iş birlikçisi rakibin, eski Fısıltı Üstadı.{/n}
